title: Banking & Finance: Corteva to Lay Off 5% of Staff
text: The agricultural giant is the latest company to announce plans to shrink its workforce as costs for labor, raw materials and transportation pressure businesses. Ford Motor Co. said last month it would shed 3,000 jobs, and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. recently said it was preparing to lay off hundreds of employees. Corteva officials said Tuesday that the company plans to exit from about 35 countries and focus on 110 countries, such as in North America, Europe and Brazil.
